algorithm_technique: Dynamic programming where dp[i] is the minimum height for the first i books.
problem_summary_simple: Place books on shelves to minimize total bookcase height.
problem_summary_technical: Use DP to find the minimum height by considering placing the last book on the current shelf or a new shelf.
key_insights: This is a classic DP problem where the state represents the minimum cost to process a prefix.
The transition involves iterating through possible placements of the last book(s) on the current shelf.
